title: So, I figured out why Xin feels like trash now.
body:
dummies are still buying jungle upgrades....

buy machete... and thats it. just get a botrk into tanky items.... it is 100% better. getting any of the jungle items aside from machete is useless and wastes  your gold... also the cutlass active is great for early ganks and securing that third Q....

anyway i am trash tier but that is what works for me.
